info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 1:44PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Otero County through 215 PM MDT... At 143 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Elk Silver. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Otero County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
